data.name: Nubla 2
data.detailed_description:
What if time stopped and the dreams and hopes of everyone could never be fulfilled? Now, your goal will be the time.

An artistic adventure with a living narrative in which returning lost creativity to a world without identity will be your way forward. Join Illái and Illú through the universe of Nubla solving the puzzles of the time-lapse and make the time go on again.

Enjoy an unforgettable trip inspired by the artistic works of Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum.





  • References to the artistic works of the most important artist in history.
  • Interactive dynamic puzzles.
  • Pure living artistic narrative.
  • Play and learn; culture and entertainment.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: An adventure in the universe of Nubla through the art of Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum. Solve the puzzles and mysteries of a world without identity or time to restore creativity and color.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64bit, Windows 8.1 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD® FX-6300
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 750 Ti / ATI Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 sound device
  • Additional Notes: Controller support: Microsoft Xbox ® Controller for Windows®

data.legal_notice: © 2018-2020 Gammera Nest. Nubla is a trademark by Gamera Nest SL in collaboration with Thyssen-Bornemisza National Museum and PlayStation® Iberia. 'PlayStation®' is a registered trademark of Sony Interactive Entertainment, Inc.
